Intimation under Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 - Consideration of the proposal to declare an interim dividend for the financial year ending 31st March 2025

This is to inform you that pursuant to Regulation 29 and other applicable regulations of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (the  Listing Regulations ), a meeting of the Board of Directors of Arihant Superstructures Limited (the  Company ) is scheduled to be held on Tuesday, March 25, 2025, at 04:30 p.m., inter-alia to: (a) Taking permission from the board for seeking approval of members of the Company by way of Special Resolution for Regularization of appointment of Mr. Sridhar Ramachandran (DIN: 07706213) from additional Independent Director to Independent Director.(b) To approve the draft Notice of Postal Ballot incorporating the proposed resolution and explanatory statement and to undertake all the necessary steps thereof.
Separate Board Meeting of Independent Directors to be held on Tuesday, 25th March, 2025.
